title: Mealworm-fortified porridge
description: High-quality powder for making nutritious porridge. Fortified with mealworm extract to increase nutritional value. Simply add water and mix!
nutritionalBenefits: High protein content from mealworm extract
usage: Mix 2-3 tablespoons with warm water. Stir well and let sit for 2 minutes before serving.
availability: Contact us for pricing and availability

title: Cricket-fortified porridge
description: We also have a cricket-fortified porridge powder. We aim to price our products affordable to reach as many children as possible.
usage: Mix 2-3 tablespoons with warm water. Stir well and serve warm.
